data.actual_result: It says "Sort" which makes no sense because you aren't really rearranging the audit log entries. Also, the same lines in recent mentions when long pressed say "Filter".
data.short_description: When you long press the three lines on the top right of an Audit log, the information toast says "Sort" instead of "Filter".
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Audit log. - Long press on the the lines on the top right.
